title: Gw2 character API include hero points?

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: It’s something I can add in, but it’s not going to be available before HoT ships, unfortunately.

comments.author: Serena Sedai.3064
comments.body: Would it be possible to extend the character API to include how many hero points the character currently has? I’d like to be able ot use this to track at a glance how many characters I may need to go run hero points for before heart of thorns, and currently can only find this information by looking in game.
